: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus saw that the Ionic shower had charged up and walked into the small chamber. He closed the door, and the chamber glowed a red pink color. His body as well as the baby was bombarded with ions which cleaned them, completely.
Rodimus Prime: See there, now you'll be all clean.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Baby:

Sniffed, sniff...

That smell again and that sounds, what could be ???

She moved her little head towards rodimus's head and star ted so 
sniffed near Rodimus' cheek. Where was mommy? if mommy was carring 
her why mommy had mixed a strange smell. That wasn't mommy, other 
smell was strong than mommy's.

she dificultly opened her little eyes, she couldn't see right yet 
but she could see a buried shape that was carring her.

<P align=center><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG>
<P align=center>Rodimus saw that the Ionic shower had charged up and walked into the small chamber. He closed the door, and the chamber glowed a red pink color. His body as well as the baby was bombarded with ions which cleaned them, completely.
<P align=center><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>See there, now you'll be all clean.
